Address.college_name: DeVry University Illinois – DeVry University Nevada

GeneralInformation.History: Founded in 1931 as De Forest's Training, Inc. Merged with Keller Graduate School of Management in 2002. Acquired current title and accreditation status in 2002. Focusing on business and management.
AdmissionRequirements: High School Diploma or GED (or equivalent); Admissions interview

GeneralInformation.History: Founded as Nevada State College, 2002. Acquired present title 2023.
